project_descr: The goal of the Global Gender Responsive Climate Change Programme has been to ensure that climate change policies, programmes and initiatives at all levels are gender-responsive and improve the lives and livelihoods of women and  men.

outputs.output_descr: The Women Delegates Fund will continue its leadership and capacity development, including by strengthening linkages for information and knowledge sharing amongst delegates and from international to national level.

The progr will focus on a few countries, but with a primary focus on Africa and Asia-Pacific, to support national governments to strengthen and integrate gender responsive climate change policies and to operationalize and implement them

Consider ways to sustain and strengthen the Alliance beyond the end of this joint programme in 2016, and this phase will include special efforts to strengthen governance and ensure sustainability of the GGCA for longer-term impact

outputs.output_title: Gend resp Glo CC pol making
outputs.output_descr: Gender equality into climate decisions and agreements

project_title: wedo global gender responsive cc programme
